name: Altershock
description:
Story:
Group of cosmonauts found life on a planet but they crashed and called for a help. Our hero is comming there to help them, he found civilisation and creatures that are not friendly for him.

Will the main hero rescue lost crew?

Instructions:

ESC - Exit
WSAD/Arrows - Movement
SHIFT - Run (3sec cooldown)
Space - Attack

Hero:
 - a cosmonaut that came to help his crew

Npcs:

- you can talk to them just by stand in front of them

Enemy:

  - Enemy will chase you if you in his range, take a hit to kill.

Collectibles:

   - a key, crystal and Bcoins (there are 6 to collect)

Game created on the beggining of 2022
